**Ghostbusters (1984)**

"Ghostbusters" is a funny movie about three weird scientists who start a business to catch ghosts in New York City. Starring Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, and Harold Ramis, it was the first comedy with big special effects. Though it cost a lot to make, it became super popular and made lots of money. The movie led to many other "Ghostbusters" things, like TV shows, games, and even more movies. It's now considered a classic and is loved by many.
